meanings.definition: The act of making something clean.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy the cleansing of my room every Saturday.
meanings.sent2: The cleansing of the kitchen was thorough and satisfying.
meanings.sent3: The cleansing of the muddy shoes turned into a fun game.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a cleansing breeze on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent5: The cleansing of the old book revealed hidden treasures within.

meanings.definition: The process of removing impurities or dirt.
meanings.sent1: The cleansing of the water made it safe to drink.
meanings.sent2: Regular cleansing of the skin helps maintain a healthy glow.
meanings.sent3: The cleansing of the messy room felt like a victory over chaos.
meanings.sent4: His apology was a cleansing of the tension between them.
meanings.sent5: The cleansing of negative thoughts brought peace to her mind.
